response.overview: “Free The Narrative” is a series that tells original and personal stories with some of professional wrestling’s biggest names, and those yet known. “Free The Narrative II” features many more “names” and is the sequel to “Free The Narrative” featuring Matt Cardona vs EC3. After his shocking dismissal from the corporate wrestling realm, join Adam Scherr on a journey of self-discovery in his return to the ring when Scherr battles EC3 in “Free The Narrative II: The Monster In Us All.” What will happen when this “monster” knocks on this “man’s” door?
response.title: Free The Narrative 2
